price: 1. Louange à Allah, à Qui appartient ce qui est dans les cieux et sur terre. À Lui la louange dans l’autre monde. Il est le Sage, l’Informé.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-ākhirati wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
